A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
One of the best star wars stories... Well written and with major plot surprises... It added new perspectives and depths on its main characters that were carefully  physiologically justified.

Memorable moment\, the fight scene between Kylo and Rey\, that were artistically displayed in a very impressive stage.

Plus---one of the most beautiful deaths of a beloved character... 

Colors\, antithesis\, wide range of feelings and the final catharsis that everyone seeks in a great film.

Well done everybody!
